definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: The type of an access intent can be either read or update.
sentences.chinese: 访问意图的类型可以是读取或是更新。

sentences.english: Intents express abstract, high-level policy requirements.
sentences.chinese: 意图表达抽象的高级策略需求。

sentences.english: An alliance with likeminded Red Talons may not be long in coming.
sentences.chinese: 有差不多意图的联盟部族比如红爪不久也会这么想。

sentences.english: Except they have a tendency to just straight up purchase the technology rather then re-make it.
sentences.chinese: 他们有意图就直截了当的收购技术而非重新制造一遍。

sentences.english: It is never my intention to be rude or to give well-meaning readers the cold shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 我绝对没有要对我的读者耍酷的意图。

sentences.english: It arranged for its importation into England with the intention of re-exporting it.
sentences.chinese: 被告意图将这批药品进口至英格兰后再转出口。

sentences.english: I held back not knowing his real intention.
sentences.chinese: 我有点犹豫不定，不知道他的真正意图是什么。

sentences.english: Sound is like clay that he sculpts to his purpose.
sentences.chinese: 声波很喜欢这个按个人意图由自己组装而成的身体。

sentences.english: The transformation was in focus and intention.
sentences.chinese: 转变主要体现在注意力和意图。

sentences.english: What else would you say is the intention of this conference?
sentences.chinese: 对于这个会议的意图，你还有什么要说的么？

sentences.english: The central meaning of his pontificate is to restore papal authority.
sentences.chinese: 他任职教皇的中心意图就是要恢复教皇权力。

sentences.english: But Jesus had no intention of founding a new sect or religion.
sentences.chinese: 但是耶稣并没有建立一个新教派或新宗教的意图。

sentences.english: Human form serves many purposes within the Tao.
sentences.chinese: 人类形体服务于道内许多意图。

sentences.english: Li Shufu has a very strategic target that can be boosted by Volvo's green technologies.
sentences.chinese: 李书福的战略意图就是拿到沃尔沃的环保技术。

sentences.english: In fact, this is also home to many foreign investors intent concerns.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，这也是许多意图进行海外置地投资者的顾虑。

sentences.english: Work with the best of intentions and gain your self respect from that.
sentences.chinese: 带着最好的意图工作并从中获得你的自我尊重吧。

definition: unspoken implication (idiom)/the actual meaning of what was said
